data.comment: Today's referee, Fernando Hernandez Gomez, has blown to start the match.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 2, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Tigres throw-in in Leon's half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 9, Guido Pizarro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tigres.
Leon have a goal kick.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 10, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Leon to check on Carlos Salcedo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Leon in the half of Tigres.
Luis Montes for Leon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
In the minute 16, In Leon Tigres attack through Luis Quinones. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 18, Andre Pierre Gignac for Tigres drives towards goal at Estadio Leon. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Carlos Salcedo returns to the field for Tigres after picking up a slight injury.
Leon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Leon in the half of Tigres.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Tigres a goal kick.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
In the minute 22, Jean Meneses (Leon) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Leon.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Leon.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon.
Tigres pushes forward through Luis Quinones, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 36, Free kick Leon.
Guido Pizarro (Tigres) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Nicolas Sosa (Leon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 38, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Tigres throw-in in Leon's half.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 42, William Tesillo (Leon) has received a first yellow card.
Andre Pierre Gignac (Tigres) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Leon defenders.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 44, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Jesus Duenas is booked for the away team.
Tigres push forward at Estadio Leon and Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leon defence.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Leon take a 1-0 lead thanks to Fernando Navarro.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tigres push upfield and Andre Pierre Gignac gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Leon defence.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for Leon, close to Tigres's area.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Tigres in the half of Leon.
Free kick in a good position for Tigres!
Andre Pierre Gignac of Tigres smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 55, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 58, Tigres's Luis Quinones breaks free at Estadio Leon. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Leon have a goal kick.
Free kick Leon.
In the minute 59, Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Free kick Leon.
Leon to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Leonardo Fernandez is replacing Luis Quinones for the away team.
In the minute 63, Tigres drive upfield and Guido Pizarro gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leon defender.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Tigres.
In the minute 64, Throw-in Tigres.
Ball safe as Leon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Leon have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Corner awarded to Leon.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 71, The home team replace Nicolas Sosa with Osvaldo Rodriguez.
Jose Rodriguez is on a sub for Jean Meneses for Leon.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 72, Tigres make their second substitution with Julian Quinones replacing Eduardo Vargas.
Tigres drives forward and Luis Rodriguez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal! Francisco Meza (Tigres) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 76, In Leon Leon attack through Luis Montes. The finish is off target, however.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Tigres a goal kick.
Can Leon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tigres's half?
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Leon.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Leon throw-in in Tigres's half.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of Leon.
The match has come to a close in Leon. The final score is 1-1.
